00020 #include "machineStatus.hh"
00021 millTool* machineStatus::theTool = 0;
00022 
00023 machineStatus::machineStatus(machineStatus const& oldStatus) {
00024         spindleStat = oldStatus.spindleStat;
00025     F = oldStatus.F;
00026     S = oldStatus.S;
00027     coolant = oldStatus.coolant;
00028     plane = oldStatus.plane;
00029     endPose = startPose = oldStatus.endPose;
00030     theTool = oldStatus.theTool;
00031 }
00032 
00038 machineStatus::machineStatus(gp_Ax1 initial) {
00039   clearAll();
00040   theTool = new ballnoseTool(0.0625,0.3125); //1/16" tool. TODO: use EMC's tool table for tool sizes
00041   startPose = endPose = initial;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void machineStatus::clearAll() {
00045   F=S=0.0;
00046   plane = CANON_PLANE_XY;
00047   coolant.flood = false;
00048   coolant.mist = false;
00049   coolant.spindle = false;
00050   endPose = startPose = gp_Ax1(gp_Pnt(0,0,0),gp_Dir(0,0,1));
00051   spindleStat = OFF;
00052   //theTool = -1;
00053   if (theTool != 0) {
00054     delete theTool;
00055     theTool = 0;
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void machineStatus::setEndPose(gp_Pnt p) {
00060   endPose = gp_Ax1( p, gp_Dir(0,0,1) );
00061 }

00063 /*
00064 void machineStatus::setTool(toolNumber n) {
00065   myTool = n;
00066   //check if the tool exists
00067   //if not, load it
00068 }
00069 */
00070 void machineStatus::setTool(uint n) {
00071   if (theTool != 0)
00072     delete theTool;
00073   double d = double(n)/16.0; //for testing, n is diameter in 16ths, and length is 5*diameter. FIXME
00074   theTool = new ballnoseTool(d,d*5.0); //TODO: use EMC's tool table for tool sizes
00075 }
